edu.uab.ssg.model.snp

Class AlleleCounter

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.uab.ssg.model.snp.AlleleCounter

  • public final class AlleleCounter
extends Object
    A helper class for counting alleles and reporting their frequencies, the name of the minor allele (if it exists), the number of missing values, as well as whether the marker appears to be biallelic, monomorphic, or from an ambiguous A/T or G/C SNP.
    Author:
    Jelai Wang

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AlleleCounter()
      Constructs an allele counter.

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addAllele(String allele)
      Adds an allele to the count.
      boolean existsAllele(String allele)
      Returns true if the given allele has been counted at least once.
      boolean existsMinorAllele()
      Returns true if the minor allele exists.
      Set<String> getAlleles()
      Returns the set of counted allele values.
      int getFrequency(String allele)
      Returns the frequency, or count, of a particular allele within the study population.
      String getMinorAllele()
      Returns the minor allele.
      int getNumberOfCountedValues()
      Returns the number of counted, non-missing allele values.
      int getNumberOfMissingValues()
      Returns the number of missing allele values.
      double getRelativeFrequency(String allele)
      Returns the relative frequency of a particular allele within the study population.
      boolean isAmbiguous()
      Returns true if counted alleles indicate an ambiguous A/T or G/C SNP.
      boolean isBiallelic()
      Returns true if the marker is bi-allelic.
      boolean isMonomorphic()
      Returns true if the marker is monomorphic.
      String toString()
      Returns a string representation of this AlleleCounter object.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AlleleCounter

        public AlleleCounter()
        Constructs an allele counter.

    • Method Detail

      • addAllele

        public void addAllele(String allele)
        Adds an allele to the count.

      • existsAllele

        public boolean existsAllele(String allele)
        Returns true if the given allele has been counted at least once.

      • existsMinorAllele

        public boolean existsMinorAllele()
        Returns true if the minor allele exists. The minor allele is the less frequent allele and is defined only if there is more than one allele at this SNP in the study population.

      • getMinorAllele

        public String getMinorAllele()
        Returns the minor allele. If the minor allele does not exist, a runtime exception is thrown.

      • getNumberOfMissingValues

        public int getNumberOfMissingValues()
        Returns the number of missing allele values. A value is missing if a sample from the study population was assessed for genotype at a particular SNP, but, for whatever reason, the allele(s) could not be determined.

      • getAlleles

        public Set<String> getAlleles()
        Returns the set of counted allele values. An allele value is counted when the addAllele method is called.

      • getNumberOfCountedValues

        public int getNumberOfCountedValues()
        Returns the number of counted, non-missing allele values.

      • getFrequency

        public int getFrequency(String allele)
        Returns the frequency, or count, of a particular allele within the study population.

      • getRelativeFrequency

        public double getRelativeFrequency(String allele)
        Returns the relative frequency of a particular allele within the study population.

      • isAmbiguous

        public boolean isAmbiguous()
        Returns true if counted alleles indicate an ambiguous A/T or G/C SNP.

      • isBiallelic

        public boolean isBiallelic()
        Returns true if the marker is bi-allelic.

      • isMonomorphic

        public boolean isMonomorphic()
        Returns true if the marker is monomorphic.

      • toString

        public String toString()
        Returns a string representation of this AlleleCounter object.
        Overrides:
        toString in class Object
